import React from 'react' import LeaderboardDashboard from './leaderboardDashboard' import GameConatiner from './game' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Wallet from './wallet' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import histroy from '../history' import {Button,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' class Home extends React.Component{ render(){ return
{ this.props.username ? this.renderComponent() : histroy.push("/login") }
} renderComponent(){ return

Welcome {this.props.username}
} } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { username : state.user.username } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Home)
